scripts.dev: pnpm run dev:shared && concurrently "pnpm run dev --workspace=src/frontend" "pnpm run dev --workspace=src/backend"
scripts.build: pnpm run build --workspace=src/shared && pnpm run build --workspace=src/frontend && pnpm run build --workspace=src/backend
scripts.clean: pnpm run clean --workspace=src/shared && pnpm run clean --workspace=src/frontend && pnpm run clean --workspace=src/backend
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && pnpm install --workspace=src/shared && pnpm install --workspace=src/frontend && pnpm install --workspace=src/backend
